languages.text: "Вот честное слово, госпожа Хейдари, не могу поверить, что разгильдяйка вроде вас могла быть успешна хоть в чем-то, даже в контрабанде".
"In truth, Mistress Heydari, I find it hard to believe that a ne'er-do-well such as yourself could be successful in any field, even smuggling."
languages.original_text: "Вот честное слово, госпожа Хейдари, не могу поверить, что разгильдяйка вроде вас могла быть успешна хоть в чем-то, даже в контрабанде".

traits.locale_text: "In truth, Mistress Heydari, I find it hard to believe that a ne'er-do-well such as yourself could be successful in any field, even smuggling."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "In truth, Mistress Heydari, I find it hard to believe that a ne'er-do-well such as yourself could be successful in any field, even smuggling."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "In truth, Mistress Heydari, I find it hard to believe that a ne'er-do-well such as yourself could be successful in any field, even smuggling."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "In truth, Mistress Heydari, I find it hard to believe that a ne'er-do-well such as yourself could be successful in any field, even smuggling."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “老实说，海达利女士，我很难想象像你这样一无是处的人能在哪个领域获得成功，就算是走私恐怕都不行。”
languages.original_text: "In truth, Mistress Heydari, I find it hard to believe that a ne'er-do-well such as yourself could be successful in any field, even smuggling."

traits.locale_text: “老实说，海达利女士，我很难想象像你这样一无是处的人能在哪个领域获得成功，就算是走私恐怕都不行。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «La verdad, señora Heydari, me resulta difícil de creer que un parásito como usted haya encontrado el éxito en un campo, incluso en el contrabando».
languages.original_text: "In truth, Mistress Heydari, I find it hard to believe that a ne'er-do-well such as yourself could be successful in any field, even smuggling."

traits.locale_text: «La verdad, señora Heydari, me resulta difícil de creer que un parásito como usted haya encontrado el éxito en un campo, incluso en el contrabando».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「正直、ヘイダリ女史、君のような無能が、どのような分野であれ成功するとは信じがたいのだよ。たとえ、密輸のようなことであってもな」
languages.original_text: "In truth, Mistress Heydari, I find it hard to believe that a ne'er-do-well such as yourself could be successful in any field, even smuggling."

traits.locale_text: 「正直、ヘイダリ女史、君のような無能が、どのような分野であれ成功するとは信じがたいのだよ。たとえ、密輸のようなことであってもな」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Tatsächlich, Herrin Heydari, fällt es mir schwer, zu glauben, dass ein Taugenichts wie Ihr auf irgendeinem Feld erfolgreich sein kann ... nicht einmal als Schmugglerin."
languages.original_text: "In truth, Mistress Heydari, I find it hard to believe that a ne'er-do-well such as yourself could be successful in any field, even smuggling."

traits.locale_text: "Tatsächlich, Herrin Heydari, fällt es mir schwer, zu glauben, dass ein Taugenichts wie Ihr auf irgendeinem Feld erfolgreich sein kann ... nicht einmal als Schmugglerin."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Pour être tout à fait honnête, maîtresse Heydari, j'ai du mal à croire qu'une bonne à rien comme vous puisse réussir dans quelque domaine que ce soit, même la contrebande. »
languages.original_text: "In truth, Mistress Heydari, I find it hard to believe that a ne'er-do-well such as yourself could be successful in any field, even smuggling."

traits.locale_text: « Pour être tout à fait honnête, maîtresse Heydari, j'ai du mal à croire qu'une bonne à rien comme vous puisse réussir dans quelque domaine que ce soit, même la contrebande. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "In truth, Mistress Heydari, I find it hard to believe that a ne'er-do-well such as yourself could be successful in any field, even smuggling."

languages.text: "Aslına bakarsan Üstat Heydari, senin gibi bir serserinin, kaçakçılık dâhil herhangi bir alanda başarılı olabileceğini pek aklım almıyor."
languages.original_text: "In truth, Mistress Heydari, I find it hard to believe that a ne'er-do-well such as yourself could be successful in any field, even smuggling."

traits.locale_text: "Aslına bakarsan Üstat Heydari, senin gibi bir serserinin, kaçakçılık dâhil herhangi bir alanda başarılı olabileceğini pek aklım almıyor."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
